page.title: 11LANDSCAPE AND BUILDING
page.content: The general{landscape}is of gentle rolling hills.The area is principally {farming}particularly dairy farming.So much of the land is pasture land.There is a small industrial or commercial site at the bottom of the village.The site is now being develaped further to include more {industrial units.} Besides the industrial units there is the {railway line},the main one between Exeter and Barnstaple .There use to be a stock yard next to the railway station.Running by the railway line is the {River Yeo}.Around the village is mostly fields.There are houses now on Kelland Hill which has changed the landscape.A large new { {housing }estate on Highfield was built twelve years ago.
